name: Egg Tossing - The Sport of Kudos
name_original: Egg Tossing - The Sport of Kudos
description:
You, the Kodu, want to toss all your eggs in one basket.

Edward can’t bear the idea and he will try to hit the eggs away.

(Although at this stage, the eggs are not flying so Ted doesn't have much to do.)

To learn how to play, read the Flying Manual at https://kathysmartgamedesigner.com/egg-tossing.html.
